The claim was initially shared on Facebo: 2020, along with a caption stating that the Supreme Court had given teachers the right to display a logo on their vehicles.
However: the Press Bureau of India, a reliable agency within the Ministry of Information and Broadcasting, dismissed the claim as "fake news" on Twitter on February 6, 2020.
Upon further investigation: it was discovered that the logo had been circulating on Facebook since at least 2017 and was actually designed by a school in Punjab, a northern state of India.
